Plot Edge-Pseudotime Correlation Density

Source: R/plot_edge_correlations.R
plot_edge_correlations.Rd

Computes and plots the density of edge-pseudotime correlations for a specified pseudotime bin and cluster.

Usage

plot_edge_correlations(
  comm_results,
  pt_results,
  seurat_obj,
  bin_name,
  cluster_field = "RNA_snn_res.0.1",
  cluster_id = "1",
  assay = "RNA",
  layer = "data",
  pseudotime_col = "pseudotime",
  method = "spearman",
  edge_threshold = 0.95,
  n_cores = 5,
  title = NULL
)

Arguments

comm_results

A list of community detection results from detect_communities_across_bins.

pt_results

A list of pseudotime bin results from compute_pseudotime_mi_network.

seurat_obj

A Seurat object containing pseudotime and cluster metadata.

bin_name

Character, name of the pseudotime bin to use (e.g., "PT2").

cluster_field

Character, metadata field for cluster IDs (default: "RNA_snn_res.0.1").

cluster_id

Character, cluster ID to filter cells (default: "1").

assay

Character, assay to use (default: "RNA").

layer

Character, data layer to use (default: "data").

pseudotime_col

Character, metadata column for pseudotime (default: "pseudotime").

method

Character, correlation method (default: "spearman").

edge_threshold

Numeric, edge weight threshold (default: 0.95).

n_cores

Integer, number of cores for parallel computation (default: 5).

title

Character, title of the plot (default: dynamically generated).

Value

A ggplot object.
